meanings.definition: A person living on or near a border.
meanings.sent1: The borderers often interact with people from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The borderers help maintain peace between neighboring nations.
meanings.sent3: The borderers had a picnic right on the edge of the country line.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a borderer, straddling two worlds with ease.
meanings.sent5: The borderers' homes were right next to the tall fence marking the border.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of borderers chatting near the border.
meanings.sent2: The borderers gathered to discuss border security.
meanings.sent3: The borderers wore matching hats to show their unity.
meanings.sent4: The borderers stood out in their colorful attire.
meanings.sent5: The borderers' presence was felt along the entire border region.
